radiographic_examinations.findings: Cirrhosis, splenomegaly, and a large cystic mass in the right ovary.
A large cystic mass measuring 30 mm × 148 mm on the right ovary, indicative of a serous cystadenoma.
Splenomegaly (114 mm × 100 mm × 163 mm), cirrhosis, portal hypertension, and an ovarian cystic mass measuring 236 mm × 143 mm × 255 mm on the right side.
